string.text: New stash information:
The rookies' Father
A eulogy is etched on the grave: "...who saved us all at the cost of his own life. Your sacrifice will not be forgotten, old friend".
Hound's grave
A eulogy is etched on the grave: "To Hound, who the Devil claimed from us so savagely. May you rest in peace. I will not fail your memory, little brother".
Grave secrets
Pulled together some loot and buried it under a grave, next to the rookie village.
Stash in the fuel tank
The train's fuel reservoir is far away from prying eyes, so it'll do for now.
Nameless grave
Managed to mow down a stray grunt and took his shit. I'm hiding this until I need it.
Under the hood
There's enough space in this old rust bucket to stuff my loot in.
Loot beneath the river rocks
Doubt anyone will look in the riverbed for goodies. Suckers.
Anomalous materials
I don't like leaving this stuff in a anomaly death trap, but it'll have to do for now.
Motor case
Setting a marker on this location. I'm carrying too much already for my rickety back...
Big trunk
Left a catch near the cranes in case of a money emergency.
It's not easy being green
In the derelict building, tucked safely in a green container.
Tunnel reward
This is the payment as we agreed. Best get it - and quickly.
Large pipe in the hangar
Alright boys, no touchy till I say so! Remember what happened to the last blowhard who tried to shaft us...
Blockpost case
Isn't the most inconspicuous stash, but it's better than letting bandits mug me out of it...
Stash of the frightened stalker
Shit man! Never going back near those Monolith freaks ever again! Whoever wants the goods now is loopy as hell!
No-brainer
Look, Borov told me to put this away so none of the shit-eating stalkers get to it - zombies make for a nice homemade repellent.
Digger's reward
Bought myself nice stuff after a dig into the trash piles.
Finders, keepers
The abandoned remains of some diggers' supplies. Not too keen about going in that tunnel though...
Supply cache #1
Left strategic supplies for emergencies on the factory rooftop. Only as a last resort!
Supply cache #2
A boxful of necessities in case of urgent needs back at the base. Only as a last resort!
Captain's reserves
The damn grunts are snooping around too much after another incident below the catacombs. Decided to move my personal items, again.
The good stuff
Put my good stuff in a rucksack and left it on the roof. No one ever goes there, so it's all dandy.
The dead grunt's backpack
Christ, one of them got me! Ah man, don't think I'm gonna make it...
Leftovers of a hunt
We were unable to find the creatures HQ wanted for the Yantar eggheads. I will put this here for further teams to use.
Lucky son of a bitch's winnings
Man, those Monos are the shit. Big on the precepts, but gambling is a-OK. Sucks for them.
My... like... stuff!
What rhymes with rucksack? Ballsack! Hah-hah, I'm a bona-fide stand-up co-me-di-an~! Ha... Man, how much money have I blown on drinks today?..
Big blue case
We carried this shit for way too long. Not sure what to do with it now...
Piping job
Left a backpack in some concrete pipe. Can't leave anything of value around those bloody dolts.
Kingpin's reward
Adam told me to keep this as a gesture of goodwill. Not sure if I should worry about what he's gonna next...
Ashes to ashes, dust to dust
The ashes of this fireplace will hide this loot well.
Rucksack in the battered car
Man, looking at this car makes me wonder how the Monolith dudes got themselves a real car. Shady shit.
Recruits' forfeit
Confiscated goods taken from new recruits. They will not be needing it anymore.
Thrash for our friends
The looted bodies of our enemies have yielded plunder. All rubbish, so surely our rowdy friends will want this.
Sad wires
God, looking at the wiring in here is depressing... Guess this will do though.
Electrified stash
Stashing this here for the moment; don't want the mates to see this.
In the blue chest under the table
Had to dump my stuff here while the Bar was empty.
Tower belongings
Stalkers don't like creeping around in heights. They're too scared one of our snipers gets the drop on them.
The chest's duty
I can't keep carrying this around if I'm not gonna use it. One of my mates will come pick it up later.
Loot near the stalker camp
Left my junk right around the camp in a backpack.
Between the blocks
Put my rucksack in-between some concrete blocks for later.
Little bonus
Whoever kills the most crows today gets the spoils of our last raid. Think of it as target practice.
Hot and wild
I think this stove will hide my shit well.
Stash on Voronin's shelf
The General lent me this box as a reward. No one will dare touch it.
Not a storage tank per say...
I'll wedge this between the storage tanks - a really good place.
Last request

I've seen it - the Bloodsucker King... Its beady eyes and tentacle-laced face salivating with hunger... I won't make it out of this alive. Please, to anyone who finds this: use this if it helps you flay the abomination!
Made a run for it
The nest is indeed here - this place is infested to the very core! I will need to make a run for it and warn my colleagues and Duty...
Stash in the panel
They stashed a few goods in the electrical panel but never touched it again. Strelok's death affected them a lot.
Backpack on the barn's rooftop
It took a lot of effort, but I managed to slink my way around the roof beams and left my loot there.
Rucksack in the attic
We mugged another asshole and got way too much crap off him. I'll leave some here.
Goodies in the box
Took the explosives, though I had to weigh myself down to carry all that.
Commander's stuff
Commander keeps his stuff right under his desk. Nobody has claimed it yet...
Merc locker
I left my gear in the locker, in the barracks.
A merc's distrust
Bastards are trying their best to get this, and I don't trust 'em one bit. They won't look in the collapsed tunnel.
Investigator's dilemma
Was sent to investigate and recover some guy's PDA. Found myself knee-deep in Bloodsuckers. Dropped all I could and ran for it.
Stash in the village tower
I heard the eggheads say Bloodsuckers don't like heights. Well, I'm not gonna stick around for long, though I'll leave this here.
Little bar treat
Managed to sneak some crap into the metal container.
Expert's belongings
An expert died while trying to bypass the military. We left his belongings in the city's rubble.
Stash of the artifact hunters
Can't believe we've gotten here after all this time. We're leaving some loot here; need to keep our bags empty for our artifact hunt.
Chest under the staircase
There's lots of good places to stash loot here. It's so empty and uncharted...
Blue box in the cinema's basement
Pripyat cinema. Ha, who would've thought I'd get here. Got a whole lot to brag about too on the way here.
Loot in the cabinet
Wow, this whole place is a bloody mess. But the opportunities are worth it, like what's in here.
The scavengers' chest
Our squad found a good place to keep our findings. When we've gotten enough, we'll drag this back to the usual place.
Rucksack in the bus
They chased us down and we held out in the bus. Ganta didn't make it. His stuff is still there.
In the crane's electrical box
Wonder how much work it would take to make this work again? Bag, I'll just use this as a stash...
In the desk
I left some spoils in the cupboard.
Within the tanker hatch
Found a good hole for my loot in the hatch.
Box in the railcar
Crap, this shit is weighing me down. There's so many of them! I gotta leave this.
In the fuel tank
I looted this off a stiff that tried to make it to the NPP.
Under the table
Some peeps say the eggheads keep something in the cardboard box in their bunker.
Backpack in the car
The Military guarding the bunker keep some stuff in the car.
A caseful
Just saw some zombies roaming outside. Kinda scared they'll try something... Just in case, I'll leave this for an emergency.
In the fireplace
Dumped this here because my hand's being forced.
Goods in the thrashed house
Under the remains of a house, hidden by the dilapidated roof - there's some loot.
Beneath the rubble
Stashed a backpack in the collapsed bridge's rubble.
Under the buried crane
Leaving these spoils here while on a big expedition.
Remainders of the hooligans
A bunch of misfits braved the old underground railway and found riches. None of them stood a chance against what lurked in the shadows...
Chest within the old lab
Whoever was operating the hidden labs was well-funded. Rumors say you can find peak shit in them.
Fool's valuables
Another fool went down to find the hidden laboratory, taking with him valuables.
In the electrical wiring
They say a crazy Ecologist went down into the underground tunnels and found a sordid lab. His stuff still lays there.
Fuel tank in the old hangar
Geez, the mates weren't kiddin' about this place. Had to be a damn fine hangar before '86. Well, it's a perfect place for this...
Developers table
Game developers worked on the second floor of that school before the Mercs found it a good place to hide their stuff.
Cinema goodies
Idiots, I hid this stuff right in front of their noses... good thing they aren't clever enough to figure it out.
Armory case
Mercenaries using this case for handling their weapons and ammo. It's well-guarded so unexpected visitors never touch it.
Gym tank
If you want to hide something use the toilet! I should probably leave my stuff there before this guy finds out that this things were stolen from him.
Basement treasure
Military guarded this house when they planned to meet high ranking guest from Moscow. They left some grenades in a box under it in case of an emergency.
Stove box
Maan, cooking is a good thing but don't you think that we can find a better place for making dinner... I know... I will go troll those churkas from pindostan at the city. Take care of it, please...
Tugboat goods

When the Zone didn't exist and the sun was bright... who cares, some stalker newbie told me that he somehow got to this ship near a lake and left all he got during trip in there, he is too scared to come back for it.
Bridge rucksack
Another day in this hard stalker life. I didn't plan to move through Merc cordons, but since I am there, better stash my equipment or they definitely will shoot me in head.
Sniper safe

Who's idea was it, from central command, to move Blackwater here? Stupid bastards! I am sure they can't imagine how hard it is to bring freedom to these people, they hate us all! I will leave some stuff in this safe, just in case of a military attack.
House caseful
This abandoned house is a good place to hide my stuff. Hope the commander will never find out about the stolen vodka.
In broken structure
Good view, warm fireplace, nice wardrobe, cool place for stolen loot.
Army box
What are we doing here? Patrolling this place is so boring! At least you can find old army boxes which can be use as personal storage.
Shithole goodies
Some gifted monolith member thought that a shithole was a good place to stash his goods.
Roof flue
Not sure who's idea it was, this drunken bastard or my smoky ass, but when we got to the roof of that house we found an ideal place for all this crap we took from dead stalkers who met us, haha.
Under the train
God bless the Monolith! God bless the... MONEY! I am proud to be a part of this, hopefully these befuddled idiots won't figure out where I am hiding my treasures.
Monolith stash
A good place to hide a sword which we will use against all our enemies.
Old pipe
Good old fashion hiding style in a pipe, some stalker did it right before he died from Monolith fire.
Electric box
Mother told me not to play with electricity, but why should I care if a holy stone protects me from everything? I will hide all my rewards I deserved for good team operations.
Under bushes
An argument about who would find the best hiding place ended badly, Never try to sneak near an angry controllers abode!
Stalled car
A luggage rack always was a good opportunity to hide something valuable for stalkers. This one planned to raid through Pripyat... though he was unlucky.
Bus stop cache

I hate this road... not sure why the commander's interested in these rocks and caves, but it's definitely not the place I wanna be! At least I can hide some RPG stuff here, it's a bitch to carry around.
Cave wagon
My mate from the dark stalkers told me that he likes this wagon like his own gun, I hope he is not crazy, but definitely he hides something beneath.
Ground box
Living in a cave is depressing: it blurs your eyes, eats at your brains... makes you feel less then human, with no chance to be normal again. At least you have all your loot near and safe.
Motor depot services
This place became a home for survived Mercenaries; why not hide some medkits and ammo under the table?
Under the fallen tree
Stalkers always find a good place to hide their equipment, there's one of them near radioactive anomaly.
Expedition items
Military expedition planned to reach escape, it was a bus station where they decided to take rest and hide some their supplies.
Lada reward
Do you like soviet cars? Probably not. That's the same thought a stranger had who walked around there. If you lose your attitude, a nice gift will be the reward.
Deadly case
As a professional I am telling you: it's impossible to get there. My outfit is the best one ever found in the Zone, so pure bastards will just die if they try to reach this case... haha.
Village case
Duty squad emergency case with medkits, bandages, etc.
Eco stash
We are scientists are we not? Right! So where's the best place to hide our goods so no one will find out? Underground Lab? No, labrat! That's too easy.
Bed box
I am on duty tonight. We will meet at 6pm, but who knows what is on this bastard mind? Better leave my valuables here.
Swamp house
You know... I've been thinking: have you seen anybody around here? No, neither have I, so let's use this stove for a stash.
Construction backpack
Sorry brothers, I tried my best, but these horrible creatures almost caught me. All I found during this journey to hell I'll will put in this rucksack. I hope I will be remembered...
Cook's goodies
If you want some food, it's time to search the kitchen.
Behind the sofa
Dear robber, if you find this backpack, please return it or I will trap and feed you to the bloodsuckers!
Dangerous supplies
This lager was full of duty before the bloodsuckers came. They all ran away and left a box with weapons.
Gas station loot
Parkour always was my hobby, Dimon. At least nobody will steal what belongs to me, I am sure.
Doc's goods
Swamp Doctor prefers the old fashion way and keep his items in front of his eyes; as his mate you can take what you need.
Stalkers' stash

These helicopters blow my mind! How we can leave here if they all want to see us dead?! At least I am not sure the military is brave enough to fight face to face, so I will hide my special items here.
Barrel bonus
Somethings not right with this barrel bro... ah, of course: I wanted to put the head of my former employer here. Okay, let's use it for a different purpose.
Concrete blocks
How do you trick a greedy bandit? Find an open space where he can get stuck in a bog and be killed by scary ghosts and then place your goods there!
Bridge cave
This bridge was full of stalkers in the past. Somebody decided to put his loot there with the hopes of returning to it one day.
Abandoned tower
Military campers had lots of medkits and equipment in an emergency case, but then they were ordered by central command to move away.
Gas supplies
I will try to figure out where this pipe goes; let's hope not from Russia to Ukraine, you know... stolen gas, haha.
Underground surgery
In case of trauma or bleeding, break this box.
Stash in Freedom's bar
What's in the bar, should stay in the bar... at least it's heavily protected by Freedom guards.
Ivancov's safe
Ivancov is quite an astute person, he always keeps his tools and equipment in a proper place.
Mono stash
The was a rumor that some monolith group settled near the dam, of course they took some items to get rid of the Outskirts guests...
Goods at the garbage
This Outskirts garbage is full of radioactive stuff, let's hide more valuable stuff here and return to Freedom camp.
Trash can
Trash is always trash, some stalkers put their useless things which they couldn't carry anymore.
Memorial star
Under the memorial star is written: "Sergey Geranovich. 1978-2012. Fought with honor and died in combat. Awarded the highest honor from his country - the USSR".
Jacob's Ladder
Nah, better not hide things in wooden church again: anyone can get in there at night and take it. Let's be more smart this time...
Bunker box
Even scientists need a place to keep their personal stuff untouched, though they always have messy tables.
Guard cache
Eco dummies, they always want to touch things which they shouldn't and use them in their experiments! Better hide my goods properly.
Substation trap
These zombies creatures are everywhere! How stupid could I be to visit this area in first place... at least this substation is a safe area to rest until help arrives... or is it?
Scientist notes

The whole situation is just horrible. I planned to do my research of these braindead humans in this area, but it all went wrong and now I have fatal injuries with no chance of escape. At least I can leave this journal of my lifetimes work here in the hopes that somebody will find it.
Buried safe
"Brainnnnsssss" - really? I am too old for such things; better leave young snorks to deal with humans and I will try to grab something for myself...
Garages sneak peak
Some stalker left his equipment near the garages, probably he will never return alive to retrieve it.
Yurik's backpack

It's awful, I'm stuck here with my mate waiting for these terrible creatures to go away, but they are just... staying. Day... night... I don't know what to do; we plan to breakthrough this factory, I will leave this backpack if we ever need to return.
Death wagon
Fall asleep my little babe... bears, monsters go away... close your eyes and close your ears... I don't want to see your tears...
Bunker's treasure
Underground bunkers are the best places to hide anything you want. Same thought one curious Merc had before a snork ate him.
Grave of Stas
Eulogy etched on the grave: "For my best mate, who supported me through my whole life and died from radiation poisoning. Rest in peace..."
Swamp branch
Scavengers, they always look around the factory for hidden stashes... but they never planed to search in the hollow of a wooden branch. I need to be careful this time!
Valve cache
It's a good place to hide something small and valuable, though the hole grid around you makes you think twice...
Harvesting the ground
I always liked excavators when was a kid... you too buddy? Let's use this place for our belongings, I will go visit this young scientists at the bunker to get protection and we can move.
Lost bus
Old soviet bus with equipment box inside it. Bandits sometime try to find anything useful here, but fail every time.
Smuggler's backpack
It's not a joke: a crazy smuggler climbed to this elevator and put his stuff near the rusty engine, but who cares if you could get there easily? I wonder if there's air-freight inside...
Boiler cache
Some former mercenaries prefer shooting unlucky stalkers from a distance. This one decided to leave his past with his backpack full of equipment.
Explosive materials
"Dangerous explosives, don't touch!" - written on the box at the Mercenaries' bar.
Lighting values
So lots of electricity failures these days... we can't live like this in our own base. Here is one place you should check.
Anomalous materials
You sure we should keep this uber-crap in such a place bro? It's too expensive to be in plain sight.
Village goodies
That military guy was too drunk and couldn't see what I did to him. Hehe, let's keep it here for now in the village.
Prison break
Some stranger decided to keep his stuff under the protection of bricks in a former prison. It was good idea at first, but he didn't know about you!
Blocked cache
Let's keep it here, we can return after the blowout. You saw those creatures nearby, I don't think anybody will risk following us to these blocks.
Under voltage stash
When dealing with high voltage, don't forget to turn off the power or you will be grilled like that stalker near the power station, at least his stuff remained.
Backpack on the train
Threw my pack in an old carriage, hopefully will still be there when I get back...
Possessions in the heli
Need to find food... must travel light... I'll leave my stuff here.
Backpack under the tree
Hid some extra supplies here, I'll be back...
Container
All obsolete weapons and ammunition to be placed here by order of the boss.
Backpack in jeep
Found these babies out in the fields. If i can just get them out of here and sell them, I'll have enough to see my girl again...
Container
Extra supplies if needed.
Container under bed
Emergency supplies in case of blowout. Do not use!
Backpack on roof
I'll throw my stuff on the roof, it's not like the dogs can get it...
Container on high
We'll leave this here for now and come back later and pick the bastards off one by one, haha!
Mesh vent
This looks like a good place to stash something.
Leap of faith
Only the penitent man shall find me!
Pipe stash
Looks a good temporary stash location.
Under the hatch
Batten down the hatches, we won't lose this stash!
Bus stash
I left a stash in that old bus. If you're short on supplies, take it.
Rucksack
If someone finds this...
Cash in the attic
My life savings should be safe up here... right?
Holy stash
Who would dare steal my stuff from such a divine place!
High and mighty stash
I guess there are low lives that would steal from a church, so I will place this up high.
Border box
Box at the end of the line.
Safe place
I'll keep my stuff in the boss's safe, no-one goes in there...
Car trunk
Damn car broke down. I'll leave my stuff here while I go for help.
Desk contents
Note to self: move stuff from desk drawer.
Community chest
All contents are property of the "Mine Bandits Inc."
Medical aid kit
Please make note of items used in the register.
Rucksack in the attic
I don't feel well at all. I'll stash my stuff in the attic until I recover.
Box in the barn
This place freaks me out, I'll leave this up here while I take a look around...
Eye of the storm
This place protected me from a blowout, so I will leave my stuff here for safe keeping.
